data.title: Columbus Blue Jackets vs St. Louis Blues Matchup History
data.meta_description: A full list of every game and series played between the Blue Jackets and St. Louis Blues in NHL history.
data.text:
What is the all-time head-to-head record between the Columbus Blue Jackets and St. Louis Blues?

The Blue Jackets and Blues have played a total of 93 games against each other. The Blue Jackets have an overall record of 35-50-3-5 (39.2%) against the Blues. Currently the Blue Jackets have a 2 game winning streak against the Blues.

What is the head-to-head record between the Columbus Blue Jackets and St. Louis Blues in the Playoffs?

The Columbus Blue Jackets and St. Louis Blues have never met in the NHL playoffs.

What is the longest winning streak for the Columbus Blue Jackets over the St. Louis Blues?

The longest all-time winning streak that the Columbus Blue Jackets have over the Blues is 4 games, which started on Mar 25, 2007 with a 4-1 win and lasted until Nov 4, 2007.

What is the head-to-head record between the Columbus Blue Jackets and St. Louis Blues in 2024?

The Blue Jackets and Blues have played a total of 2 games against each other in the 2023-24 season in which the Blue Jackets won both of the games. All the games were played in the regular season.

When was the last game between the Columbus Blue Jackets and St. Louis Blues?

The last game between the Blue Jackets and Blues was on Jan 30, 2024, when the Blue Jackets had a 1-0 win on the road over the Blues.
